column1: Little Goat Diner////Best thing about my meal: cup of goat chili
column2: slice of Elvis cake. Bad taste in the mouth: the blonde receptionist
column3: who seated everyone else before us (even the walk ins with no reservations)
column4: pretended to text us to tell us our seats were available but actually did not do so
column5: ignored our brown faces even when we were right in front of her
column6: then sat us near the bar even when plenty of tables and chairs were available. The waitress was sweet
column7: as was the bakery salesperson. But that receptionist needs a major sitdown with the owners.
